name: Robert J. BRINKER and Brenda G. Brinker, his wife, Appellants, v. GEORGE FARMS, INC., and Thomas S. George and Jean L. George, his wife

judges: Before NIX; C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ., dissent.
parties: Robert J. BRINKER and Brenda G. Brinker, his wife, Appellants, v. GEORGE FARMS, INC., and Thomas S. George and Jean L. George, his wife.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Kurt S. Rishor, Butler, Pa., for appellants.
Ralph L.S. Montana, Ralph L.S. Montana & Associates, Clarion, Pa., for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
580 A.2d 314
Robert J. BRINKER and Brenda G. Brinker, his wife, Appellants, v. GEORGE FARMS, INC., and Thomas S. George and Jean L. George, his wife.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 27, 1990.
Decided Oct. 16, 1990.
Kurt S. Rishor, Butler, Pa., for appellants.
Ralph L.S. Montana, Ralph L.S. Montana & Associates, Clarion, Pa., for appellees.
Before NIX; C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS and CAPPY, JJ.
